system.sustained: The psyker detects the tell-tale Odour of the warp on objects, places, and people. The Psyker makes a Focus Power Test and gains information based on their Degrees of Success. Information doesn't go into great detail. Results: 1 DoS: Psyker knows if object has been in contact with the something warp-related in the last Psy Rating Hours. 2 DoS: Psyker knows the nature of the contact an object has had with the warp (part of ritual, held by psyker, etc) within the last Psy Rating Hours. 3 DoS: Psyker knows if person has been touched by the warp, but not how. 4 DoS: Psyker determines person's relationship with the warp, whether they are psyker, sorcerer, possessed, etc. 5+ DoS: Dicern's nature of any target's warp connection, presence of warp gates, dark pacts, possession etc. HB: 0 DoS: Psyker gets offput feeling if something is warped in range.
